content: try these quick and easy fingerless mitts for yourself or for holiday gifts mitts are worked flat in tunisian crochet using the honeycomb stitch pattern with a contrasting tunisian knit section for the thumbs then seamed using the flat slip_stitch crochet technique uses approximately 150 yds of dk weight yarn shown in madeline tosh dk to make both mitts can also be made using 150 yds of sock/fingering weight held double with a mohair for a luxurious twist each mitt takes approximately 2-3 hours making this an ideal quick-gift make
